# guest

**Instance Property**

The identity of the person making the reservation.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var guest: INRestaurantGuest? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the identity of the person making the reservation. Depending on the preferences you specify in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetRestaurantGuestIntentResponse/guestDisplayPreferences] property, this person may or may not be the person associated with any newly created reservations.

## Specifying the Response Details

- **guestDisplayPreferences**: The options for specifying how you want guest information conveyed to the user.
